title: 'Give Us Five Years': Cathie Wood Defends Struggling Tech Stocks As Flagship Fund Craters - Forbes
content: 'Give Us Five Years': Cathie Wood Defends Struggling Tech Stocks As Flagship Fund Craters  Forbes
description: Shares of Ark, famous for massive bets on stocks like Tesla and Zoom, have cratered 50% since an all-time high last year.
